game_description: Full version here: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5368758349867888 Explore a lovingly hand-crafted world full of swift carrots, weirdly aggressive tomatoes, and potatoes who are just trying their best. Help a little turnip who works in an office! Support a small business run by a carrot in a hat! Decorate a cute home to share with your favorite veggies! And never forget: you're surrounded by friends. Join the Cookie Gardening Discord for updates: https://discord.gg/Stw3W2xHv3 (Please note, there's currently no way to transfer your save file from the demo to the full version.)
